docs.title: anndata_seurat_utilities
docs.text: Welcome to the documentation for anndata_seurat_utilities, a Python package designed to ensure seamless interoperability between AnnData (.h5ad) objects and downstream Seurat / SeuratDisk workflows in R.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Sanitizes and normalizes obs / var metadata
  • Converts problematic pandas dtypes (boolean, Int64, categorical)
  • Fixes HDF5 structures that cause SeuratDisk conversion errors
  • Removes empty metadata columns
  • Sanitizes column names to avoid HDF5 path issues
  • Optional removal of heavy layers (e.g., counts_mouse)
  • Writes .h5ad files compatible with SeuratDisk::Convert()

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text:
pip install anndata_seurat_utilities

Please see the Usage Guide for an example at https://github.com/denvercal1234GitHub/anndata_seurat_utilities

More utilities (including advanced visualisation) will be provided soon. Cheers!

docs.title: Install in Editable Mode
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/denvercal1234GitHub/anndata_seurat_utilities
pip install -e .
# Run test
pytest -q

docs.title: Install official release from PyPI
docs.text:
pip install anndata-seurat-utilities
## Quick test; if printing version then succeeded
python -c "import anndata_seurat_utilities; print(anndata_seurat_utilities.__version__)"

docs.title: Development install
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/denvercal1234GitHub/anndata_seurat_utilities
cd anndata_seurat_utilities
pip install -e .
pytest -q
